main.title: Krypto presents PWNLAND
main.text: This is a 3-day challenge based on real-world cryptography. This will run from 12:00 IST 25 March, 2015 to 12:00 IST 28 March, 2015. For any queries, you can reach us at krypto.udyam@gmail.com.

about.title: About
about.news_text: This is **not** the main Krypto event, but is intended to provide more insight into real world cryptography. You can reach us at krypto.udyam@gmail.com
about.rules_text: This is an individual event. Goodies for top 3 participants! Hurry!

error.title: Error
error.login_required: You need to be logged in to see this page
